body_html: I didn't have time to review this yet, but I'm concerned that our C++ dataset API starts diverging from the Python one significantly. We should stop this and bring them together, or we should stop calling this a C++ interface to PyTorch.
body_text: I didn't have time to review this yet, but I'm concerned that our C++ dataset API starts diverging from the Python one significantly. We should stop this and bring them together, or we should stop calling this a C++ interface to PyTorch.
body: I didn't have time to review this yet, but I'm concerned that our C++ dataset API starts diverging from the Python one significantly. We should stop this and bring them together, or we should stop calling this a C++ interface to PyTorch.
